How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?

chat.msg: hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
Si
great, I'm at the starting point seeing a twig that leads to a little island with a tiger
Where should I go from here?
Comienza en el X
cool, i've started at the x spot
i'm seeing the twig, the tiger on the island, and a few more islands around. guide me, buddy!
go through the isla del tigre hasta vea a parrot
alright, i crossed through tiger island
now, i see the parrot on the big island. which direction now?
go around the parrot between and go between the parrot and elephant
okie dokie, i'm walking around the parrot, headed towards the elephant
keep going around the parrot and cross the rocks until you see a frog
got it, bypassing the parrot, crossing the rocks now and i see the frog on a new island, where to next?
go south of the frog and then turn back around until you see an alligator bridge.
Muy bien, fui al sur de la rana y di la vuelta, parándome cerca del puente de los caimanes, ¿a dónde debo ir ahora?
Atreviesa el puente de los caimanes y sigue adelante hasta veas la jirafa
sure thing, crossed the alligator bridge, now i'm on the elephant island and i see the giraffe too, where am i going next?
go to the giraffe island and go south until you see a small bridge
cool, i'm going south on the giraffe island, i see a small bridge, should i cross it?
yes
all right, crossed the small bridge, and oh, there's a snake here
which way do i go from here?
go past the snake until you see el tesoro
¡Oh, pasé la serpiente, veo el tesoro! *terminado* esto fue divertido hombre, ¿qué sigue?

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to start?
si
¡excelente! ahora, gira ligeramente a la izquierda y camina debajo del banco.
¿Ves el sendero que lleva al puesto de floristería? comienza a caminar hacia él. en camino amigo!
hecho
¡genial! ahora en una vuelta rápida, haz un giro en "u" hacia la izquierda y vuelve por donde viniste, cruzando nuevamente el sendero
ok, ahora?
desde donde está el perro blanco, cruza el sendero, dirígete hacia el sur
hay otro perrito blanco junto a un mantel de picnic a cuadros. ¿lo ves?
si
great, now let's continue
We will cross over the tablecloth, next to a bowl of berries, and continue west
ok
perfect
now look for a wooden branch crossing the river and walk across it to the north
there are 2 branches
elige el que no te hará chocar con un arbusto verde, pero tomaremos un desvío para rodearlo, pero iremos a la derecha, no a la izquierda.
ok
Right, we are near the florist's stand, now turn left and go under the stand
ok
great! keep heading west. you will see a big bridge with two people cycling
just pass the bridge. keep walking. you're doing great!
ok
a bit further, you'll see two old folks sitting on a bench, reading newspapers
keep following the path. you're on the right track!
ok
great job! now, go south a little bit
east of the bench, there is another branch with a green bush. can you see it?
yes
Genial, ahora ve hacia el este entre la rama y el arbusto.
ok
perfecto! continua un poco más hacia el este
pronto llegarás a algo especial

chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
si, ve al sur hasta vea el perrito
made, I'm seeing the dog next to the fire
where do I go from here?
go under the dog and above the fire
Bien, ahora estoy debajo del perro y encima del fuego.
¿Qué sigue, amigo?
go under the mushroom
perfect, i'm now below the red mushroom
¿dónde toca ahora?
go down until you see the telescope
i'm at the telescope now
what's the next move, mate?
go around the telescope and then follow the road until you see rocks
¡ajá! ¡Veo las rocas y también hay una casa de madera! parece que lo logramos
go onto the rocks to reach the cabin
Genial, estoy en la casa de madera.
*finalizado*

chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
si
¡impresionante! Dirígete hacia el suroeste bajo la primera palma, gira a la derecha en la segunda y luego gira bruscamente a la izquierda antes de la tercera.
Dirígete hacia el sur, ¿vale?
yes
brilliant. Now, you will see a brown puppy, stay to its left
turn left a little and then right, heading south. everything is OK until now?
yes
bien! ahora verás una roca grande al oeste y una roca pequeña al este
cruza entre ellas y llegarás al agua
ok
genial! ve al agua y rumbo a ese cangrejo rojo
ok
¡excelente! Ahora gira a la derecha, en dirección oeste, y sigue la roca bajo el agua.
continuar en esta dirección. ¡lo estás haciendo bien!
ok
you will find a medium rock, keep going a bit then you will spot a shark, at this point turn right sharply
cómo vas hasta ahora?
ok
bravo! from there, return to the land, cross between the medium sized rock and a multi-colored ball, then head north
ok
now, gently curve to the left heading north-west
you'll find a red tent to your left and a larger speaker to your right
ok
¡bien hecho! Ahora, rodea la tienda en forma de arco, te dirigirás hacia el sur después de este movimiento.
¿guay, verdad?
ok
ahora estás casi al borde del agua, pero no te mojes todavía! gira a la derecha y estarás debajo de un kayak rojo
ok
now turn right, heading north, and follow the kayak to the end
ok
¡excelente! llegaste al final, estás justo en frente de un pequeño arbusto verde
¡buen trabajo!

general_survey.question: Have you ever lived in a home environment or country where your second language was spoken? If so, please explain briefly:
On a day-to-day basis, how likely are you to have a conversation using both your first and second languages?
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At work
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At home
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with friends
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with family
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Using social media
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?
What do you think when others mix languages in conversation? Please explain:

general_survey.answer: No comments. Mostly speak Spanish with friends.
